title: Tired of people hitting gold/plat 5 then proceed to troll.
body:
Legit, I'm silver 2 right now so I get a lot of gold 5 players on my team and they literally just fucking troll. Had a Lee Sin support last game who first item bought Dorans Blade and soft inted into oblivion.

Cannot wait for next season.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Flamingdusk,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mEoPqlE2,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-09-29T18:59:26.985+0000)
>
> Legit, I&#039;m silver 2 right now so I get a lot of gold 5 players on my team and they literally just fucking troll. Had a Lee Sin support last game who first item bought Dorans Blade and soft inted into oblivion.
> 
> Cannot wait for next season.

My diamond 5 (was d4) account would love to have a conversation with you.  Care to join me for a cup of tea?
as I inch closer to Diamond 5 I am so curious to see what its like. I hear so much about it, but makes sense that most people would be boosted to Diamond 5 and then just stay there.
